t: Cancel Items and Orders - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can cancel physical items or orders that haven't shipped yet by visiting Your Orders in Your Account.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

After repeated attempts to deal with the age old problem of brand theft on amazon we have decided to quit Amazon to protect our Brand. We have ended all 1600 listing and we have no current piggy backers on any of our listings. I am registered in amazons brand registry (which is fairly pointless) ...

t: How to Cancel Amazon Prime - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to cancel Amazon Prime by managing your Prime Membership.

t: Cancel Brand Registry Account - General Selling on Amazon Questions - Amazon Seller Forums
s: March 16, 2017 - Hello, I want to know what’s the best way to close the brand registry account when you have a Seller account suspension. We don’t know if closing the account will close the brand registry account too. Does anyone can help with this? thanks in advance

Hi, i am an amazon seller and i have been selling for over 6 months now. My sales started to increase and suddenly my account is at risk of deactivation and i have no idea why. I am a brand owner and i pay factories in china to manufacture my products, so it is not about product authenticity i hope.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Cancel Your Subscribe & Save Subscription - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can cancel your subscription through Your Subscribe & Save in Your Account.

t: Cancel an Order in the Amazon Shopping App - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can cancel an order in the app as long as it hasn't entered the shipping process by visiting Your Orders.

t: Help & Contact Us - Amazon Customer Service
s: Visit the Amazon Customer Service site to find answers to common problems, use online chat, or call customer service phone number at 1-888-280-4331 for support.

t: What Happens When I Close My Account? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Once your account is closed, it is no longer accessible. You won't be able to access your order history or print a proof of purchase or an invoice. The closure also affects related customer accounts, features, and services that are linked to your email address and password across any Amazon ...

t: Cancel Your Grocery Subscription - Amazon Customer Service
s: It's easy to end your Grocery Subscription, or cancel your free trial.

t: Cancel Items or Orders - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can cancel items or orders that haven't shipped by visiting the Order section in Your Account

t: How to cancel an order on Amazon
s: March 3, 2025 - Learn how to cancel an order on Amazon quickly and easily with our guide. Follow a few simple steps to avoid unwanted purchases with ease.

t: Cancel a Prime Video add-on Subscription. - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to cancel a Prime Video add-on subscription through the Amazon website.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.
